title: Wi-Fi domain. What is it? And why is it?
content:
Dear All!

just recently I bought a brand new Pixel 4a which is now distributed with Android 11.
When I was at home I was able to connected to any Wi-Fi network but I have just came to work now offshore and trying to connect to our vessel Wi-Fi.

I have only Login and Password to connected to the Wi-Fi. There is no Domain or it is Unknown as far as I know and as I can see from the terminal on my laptop.

The system (Android 11) keeps requesting Domain from me and since I cannot provide it refusing connecting. 

I need to get Wi-Fi up and running on my Pixel to be able to stay online in some messengers.

I would appreciate you help.

Alex
